name: One Day (itch) (Axyre)
description:
Change your fate~

One Day is a Ren'Py visual novel game I rushed in 2 days for a school project but never intended for public play but decided to do it anyway as it's already on itch.io (but restricted).  

I have plans to remake it in Unity but that will depend on 2 things:

  • Time
  • How well this one will do
Features
  • 10 Endings
  • An attempt at overworld map traversal in Ren'Py
Credits

I'm sorry for this but I can't remember where I found the assets. If anyone knows them, do tell. I only remember using a few.

  • SFX (alarm, piano, lightbulb, bell)
  • Background
  • All-Star piano ver
Changelog

1.0.1 Bug fixes

1.0.2 Major bug fix that prevented the game to even start
